statements: SELECT * FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT name, address FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, permit_number FROM disposal_sites WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, address, permit_number FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY name DESC, permit_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites WHERE name LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT id, name, permit_number FROM disposal_sites WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT address, name FROM disposal_sites WHERE permit_number = 'PERMIT123' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, address, permit_number FROM disposal_sites WHERE id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002');
SELECT id, address FROM disposal_sites WHERE name = 'Site XYZ' OR permit_number = 'PERMIT456';
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, site_location FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permitted_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM permitted_facilities;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_name = 'Site A';
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_location = 'City Center';
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permitted_facilities WHERE facility_location = 'Industrial Area' ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM permitted_facilities WHERE facility_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_location = 'California';
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM facilities WHERE facility_location = 'New York';
SELECT waste_id, waste_name, waste_disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste WHERE waste_type = 'Toxic';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_location DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM disposal_sites LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT site_name, permitted_waste_type FROM disposal_sites WHERE permitted_quantity > 100;
SELECT facility_name, permits_valid_until FROM disposal_facilities WHERE permits_valid_until > NOW();
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration';
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites WHERE permitted_waste_type = 'Hazardous' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT site_name, location, permitted_waste_type FROM disposal_sites WHERE permitted_quantity > 100 ORDER BY site_name;
SELECT * FROM disposal_facilities WHERE permits_valid_until <= '2022-12-31' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY facility_name DESC;

SELECT facility_name, contact_person FROM disposal_facilities JOIN facility_permits ON disposal_facilities.facility_id = facility_permits.facility_id WHERE permit_status = 'Active' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT facility_name, address, capacity FROM disposal_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_types WHERE waste_name LIKE '%Hazardous%';
SELECT disposal_id, site_id, facility_id, volume, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites WHERE location='California';

SELECT disposal_id, site_name, facility_name, volume FROM disposal_sites JOIN waste_disposal ON disposal_sites.site_id=waste_disposal.site_id JOIN disposal_facilities ON waste_disposal.facility_id=disposal_facilities.facility_id ORDER BY volume DESC;

SELECT d.site_name, f.facility_name, p.issue_date FROM disposal_sites d JOIN waste_disposal w ON d.site_id=w.site_id JOIN disposal_facilities f ON w.facility_id=f.facility_id JOIN permits p ON f.facility_id=p.facility_id ORDER BY p.issue_date ASC;
